import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import products from '../products' import Rating from '../rating' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: €{product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: €{product.price} Status: {product.countInStock >0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} } export default ProductScreen
